name: Yrstaldt
description:
This one-page print & play system-neutral TTRPG OSR sandbox by Horos presents the Yrstaldt citadel and environs. An all-color hand-drawn illustration by Gustav Sokol is provided, depicting Yrstaldt Citadel's major locations including:

• Yrstaldt Castle

• Citadel temple

• Blacksmith, locksmith, and Wheelwrights Guild

• Tavern and inn

• Citadel gates

Yrstaldt environs are also presented including several inspiring points of interest ready to explore like the Forest of the Blind Seer and the Dark Wyrm's Lair. Flavor texts help you choose the right location for your next adventure.

For use with your favorite TTRPG OSR ruleset.
